wikipedia_page.main: William Bowie (31 December 1869 – 9 June 1934) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Linthouse, Clyde and Scotland.

response: *Captain William Bowie (1721after 1776), American politician, delegate to the Annapolis Convention (1774–1776)
